entry.string: What is it?
entry.translation: Vhet is it?

entry.string: The Window module is a port of the popular PostWrap module (for PostNuke) to Xaraya. It lets you display standalone external web pages from within your Xaraya site.
entry.translation: Zee Veendoo mudoole-a is a purt ooff zee pupooler PustVrep mudoole-a (fur PustNooke-a) tu Xereya. It lets yuoo deespley stundelune-a ixternel veb peges frum veethin yuoor Xereya seete-a.

entry.string: Window uses the center block to display the external page(s).
entry.translation: Veendoo uses zee center bluck tu deespley zee ixternel pege-a(s).

entry.string: Pages correspond to URLs. You can display pages off your local server, or from the Internet.
entry.translation: Peges currespund tu URLs. Yuoo cun deespley peges ooffff yuoor lucel serfer, oor frum zee Internet. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: You can define a number of different options for your external page(s), among them the height and width of the display, whether only registered users may see them, and so on.
entry.translation: Yuoo cun deffeene-a a noomber ooff deefffferent oopshuns fur yuoor ixternel pege-a(s), emung zeem zee heeeght und veedt ooff zee deespley, vhezeer oonly regeestered users mey see-a zeem, und su oon. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: You can display as many pages as you like, each with its own settings.
entry.translation: Yuoo cun deespley es muny peges es yuoo leeke-a, iech veet its oovn setteengs.

entry.string: How to use it?
entry.translation: Hoo tu use-a it?

entry.string: There are two administration pages, one for general and one for URL specific settings.
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a tvu edmeenistreshun peges, oone-a fur generel und oone-a fur URL speceeffic setteengs.

entry.string: General settings are valid for all URLs.
entry.translation: Generel setteengs ere-a feleed fur ell URLs. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: The general settings available are:
entry.translation: Zee generel setteengs efeeeleble-a ere-a:

entry.string: Display only pages off the local server, or also from other servers on the Internet.
entry.translation: Deespley oonly peges ooffff zee lucel serfer, oor elsu frum oozeer serfers oon zee Internet.

entry.string: Buffer the output before displaying it.
entry.translation: Booffffer zee ooootpoot beffure-a deespleying it.

entry.string: Allow direct input from the browser address bar.
entry.translation: Elloo durect inpoot frum zee brooser eddress ber. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp!

entry.string: Allow only pages from a list of URLs you define.
entry.translation: Elloo oonly peges frum a leest ooff URLs yuoo deffeene-a.

entry.string: Let only registered users, or all users, see the pages.
entry.translation: Let oonly regeestered users, oor ell users, see-a zee peges.

entry.string: Display the page directly, or display a link that lets you open the page in a separate window.
entry.translation: Deespley zee pege-a durectly, oor deespley a leenk thet lets yuoo oopee zee pege-a in a seperete-a veendoo.

entry.string: Use a standard title for the page(s) or use a different title for each page.
entry.translation: Use-a a stunderd teetle-a fur zee pege-a(s) oor use-a a deefffferent teetle-a fur iech pege-a.

entry.string: Automatically adjust the size of the display to fill your available space, or not.
entry.translation: Ootumeteecelly edjoost zee seeze-a ooff zee deespley tu feell yuoor efeeeleble-a spece-a, oor nut.

entry.string: Define the height and width of the display.
entry.translation: Deffeene-a zee heeeght und veedt ooff zee deespley. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: You can also define specific settings for different pages.
entry.translation: Yuoo cun elsu deffeene-a speceeffic setteengs fur deefffferent peges.

entry.string: URL specific settings, such as the dimensions of the display, will override the general settings.
entry.translation: URL speceeffic setteengs, sooch es zee deemensiuns ooff zee deespley, veell ooferreede-a zee generel setteengs.

entry.string: To display an external page, create an entry for it in the user menu. (See the Blocks module for information on how to do this.) In the URL field of the menu entry write the following:
entry.translation: Tu deespley un ixternel pege-a, creete-a un intry fur it in zee user menu. Hurty flurty schnipp schnipp! (See-a zee Blucks mudoole-a fur inffurmeshun oon hoo tu du thees. Um gesh dee bork, bork!) In zee URL feeeld ooff zee menoo intry vreete-a zee fullooeeng:

entry.string: <your page> can be an actual URL, such as http://www.xaraya.com, or an alias you define via your URL specific settings.
entry.translation: <yuoor pege-a> cun be-a un ectooel URL, sooch es http://www.xaraya.com, oor un eleees yuoo deffeene-a feea yuoor URL speceeffic setteengs.

entry.string: You can also add other parameters, as in the following example. See the docs/install.txt for more details.
entry.translation: Yuoo cun elsu edd oozeer peremeters, es in zee fullooeeng ixemple-a. See-a zee ducs/instell.txt fur mure-a deteeels. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Included Blocks
entry.translation: Inclooded Blucks

entry.string: None.
entry.translation: Nune-a.

entry.string: Included Hooks
entry.translation: Inclooded Huuks

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
